description: This contemporary bistro with a hint of vintage style in its decor now has a new location. The menu is inspired by Roman traditions, with the occasional imaginative twist and other more Mediterranean-inspired dishes, all showing a strong focus on seasonal ingredients. The excellent wine list includes a whole page dedicated to wines by the glass. Friendly yet professional service from the young team completes the picture.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
